::DrillBit::

DrillBit activated his two optics, six insect leg maching guns, and his
gattaling gun. He provided cover fire, for everyone trying to get to
Phobia's ship.
"Come on, everyone! We have to move.., NOW!" He kept shooting at the
Maximals.
"Get to the ship!"

::Hot Rod::

Hot Rod deactivated his weopons, and walked to his room. He went to
sleep.
